short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep your browsing private. Just turn it on and browse worry-free!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep your browsing private with "No History from Now." This extension clears all new browsing history when activated.

Features:
One-Click Activation
Automatic History Clearing
Automatic History Cleaning of your given blocklist websites
Delete All History in single click

Perfect for anyone who values privacy. Download now and browse worry-free!
